ch.aplu.util

Class EntryPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.util.EntryPane

  • public class EntryPane
extends java.lang.Object
    Container for EntryItems to be used for EntryDialog areas. The size is adapted to the items it contains.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntryPane(EntryItem... items)
      Creates an entry pane with no surrounding border lines.
      EntryPane(java.lang.String borderTitle, EntryItem... items)
      Creates an entry pane with thin border lines and given title text displayed at the top border line.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.swing.JPanel getPane()
      Returns the underlaying JPanel.
      void setTitle(java.lang.String borderTitle)
      Modifies the title text displayed on the upper border line.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • EntryPane

        public EntryPane(EntryItem... items)
        Creates an entry pane with no surrounding border lines. The EntryPane contains any number of EntryItems, but they must be of the same type. (IntegerEntry, DoubleEntry and StringEntry are considered to have the same type.)
        Parameters:
        items - any number of EntryItems (of the same class)

      • EntryPane

        public EntryPane(java.lang.String borderTitle,
         EntryItem... items)
        Creates an entry pane with thin border lines and given title text displayed at the top border line. The EntryPane contains any number of EntryItems, but they must be of the same type. (IntegerEntry, DoubleEntry and StringEntry are considered to have the same type.)
        Parameters:
        borderTitle - the text displayed on the top border line (may be empty)
        items - any number of EntryItems (of the same class)

    • Method Detail

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(java.lang.String borderTitle)
        Modifies the title text displayed on the upper border line.
        Parameters:
        borderTitle - the new border title. If the pane has no border, nothing happens

      • getPane

        public javax.swing.JPanel getPane()
        Returns the underlaying JPanel.
        Returns:
        the JPanel reference
